Package us.ba3.me

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConvertPointCallback  
    VectorMapDelegate
    Defines the interface for vector map delegates.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrowPulse  
    BitmapSimple
    BitmapSimple is a helper class used to extract image data from Bitmaps into an array of bytes.
    ColorBar  
    ConfigChooser  
    CoordinateBounds
    Coordinate bounds is a utility class used to represent a geographic bounding box.
    HaloPulse
    Describes an animated vector circle that can be added as a layer to highlight the location of vehicles or landmarks.
    Location
    Location is used to convey a 2D geographic location or lat/lon pair.
    Location3D
    Location3D is used to convey a 3D geographic location or lat/lon pair plus an altitude.
    MapInfo
    Describes the attributes of a map.
    MapView
    MapView is the primary way of interfacing with the Altus Mapping Engine.
    MapViewContextFactory  
    MapViewRenderer  
    ReadyListener
    A utility class useful for adding an event that is triggered when the mapping engine has completed its internal initialization.
    VectorMapInfo
    Describes the attributes of a dynamic vector map layer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ArrowPulseStyle  
    ImageDataType
    Conveys a type of raster image.
    MapContentType
    Represents the type of map data found in virtual or disk-based maps.
    MapLoadingStrategy
    Conveys how the strategy for how the mapping engine shoud load map data.
    MapType
    Conveys map type for special disk-based and streaming maps.
